alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 4:27AM EST until December 19 at 5:18PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Pemigewasset River At Woodstock affecting Grafton County. Pemigewasset River At Plymouth affecting Belknap and Grafton Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pemigewasset River at Plymouth. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.1 feet, Flood waters rise to the doors of the PSU physical education center and the PSU ice arena. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 2.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 20.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
